Broken Chains.name: Broken Chains
Broken Chains.fullText:
Avatar of Freedom Utility 26Broken Chains

Raising your weapon or implement high, you issue a proclamation that you shall not abide oppression. Your allies respond by shaking off their afflictions.

Daily        Divine, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, when an ally starts his or her turn within 5 squares of you, that ally can make a saving throw against each effect on him or her that a save can end.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 146.
